response.overview: After an intense car accident, a young woman learns a type of visualization therapy called Reconsolidation of Traumatic Memory. The treatment aims to add levels of dissociation to the traumatic memory in order to remove the emotional response from the memory itself. By harnessing the full capacity of her imagination and conjuring strength from her connection to the people she loves, she is able to overcome her fears and drive again.
response.title: Reconsolidation
